text: 1) Determine he energies and plot the corresponding wavefunctions for the three lowest energy states of an electron in the potential 𝑉(𝑥)=𝑥 . 2) Determine he energies and plot the corresponding wavefunctions for the three lowest energy states of an electron in the potential 𝑉(𝑥)=𝑥 (for 𝑥> 0) and 𝑉(𝑥)= ∞ (for 𝑥≤ 0).
